```{r}
# import libraries
library(dplyr) 
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(quantmod)
library(timetk)
library(timeDate)
```

```{r}
# import Amazon and Boeing datasets
AMZN <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\Ran Q\\Desktop\\Harvard Research\\AMZN Prices.csv", header = TRUE)
BA <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\Ran Q\\Desktop\\Harvard Research\\BA Prices.csv", header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
head(AMZN)
```
```{r}
head(BA)
```

```{r}
AMZN[,1] <- as.Date(AMZN[,1])
AMZN %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = Close)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(title = "Amazon Stock Series", y = "Closing Price", x = "Month") 
   
```

```{r}
BA[,1] <- as.Date(BA[,1])
BA %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = Close)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(title = "Boeing Stock Series", y = "Closing Price", x = "Month") 
```
